name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Taishi / 信長の野望･大志
description: "Nobunaga's Ambition: Taishi" is the 15th and latest in the historical simulation game series Nobunaga's Ambition. Where a warrior's resolve exceeds their ambition. We offer the grandest warring states experience to all the fans out there!
